original_text: He took all the gold and silver and all the articles found in the temple of the Lord and in the treasuries of the royal palace. He also took hostages and returned to Samaria.
korean_text: 또 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 곳간에 있는 금 은과 모든 기명을 탈취하고 또 사람을 볼모로 잡고서 사마리아로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: He took all the gold and silver
and all the articles found in the temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 성전에서 발견된 모든 기물들을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and in the treasuries of the royal palace
